attributes.action: Create a bank holiday for everyone to meet up and socialise!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We work all day, senseless hours for peanuts! In the evening we waste our free time grinding murlocs!

This petition is for the people of Malevolents of Xlbalba, a day of rest, a day of glory, a day of freedom from the tireless work we all slave at. 

Bank holidays! we need more!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
